title: Super Mario Bros. Movie Gets New 4K Limited Edition Steelbook - Preorder Now

description:
Wolverine is one of a few different X-Men present in Marvel Rivals, using his adamantium claws to deal close-range damage as a Duelist. His skill set encourages aggressive tactics, with his rage passive building by dealing or taking damage. Getting the most out of Wolverine requires you to understand the best order to use his abilities and manage his two passive abilities. Here's how to get the most out of the short and dangerous Wolverine.


Wolverine overview


Wolverine is an entirely melee-based Duelist (damage dealer) in Marvel Rivals, which isn't c
title: Marvel Rivals Wolverine Hero Guide

description:
Path of Exile 2 is now in early access and doing big numbers on Steam and Twitch--the latter partially because there are some free rewards to claim for the dark-fantasy ARPG just by watching.

There will be two weeks of free Twitch Drops for Path of Exile 2, with different rewards each week. For week one, players just need to watch for three hours between December 6-14 to snag the Energising Bolt Flask effect and the Halo of the Righteous helmet attachment. Week two, from December 14-22, also requires three hours of Path of Exile watched on Twitch but only grants one reward--the Temporal Lord's portal effect.
title: How To Earn Path Of Exile 2 Twitch Drops For Early Access

description:
During Path of Exile 2 Act 1, you'll eventually come across a main story quest called "The Trail of Corruption." This is one of the longer quests in Act 1 and culminates with quite a difficult boss fight. Over the course of the quest, you'll travel to a few different areas on the map, one of which is simply called "the Village."

The game doesn't explain where the Village is or how to find the entrance to it. Luckily, we have a full guide below that shows you everything you need to know about progressing The Trail of Corruption quest in Path of Exile 2.

The Village location in Path of Exile 2
title: Path Of Exile 2: How To Get Into The Village In Trail Of Corruption

description:
In Path of Exile 2, you acquire different kinds of skills throughout the course of the leveling process. However, leveling up your character only grants access to a passive ability skill tree, where you can spend points to buff various stats. The actual skills you use in combat can't be acquired via leveling up. Instead, Path of Exile 2 requires you to find Uncut Skill Gems and create a Skill Gem to be used for different available skills depending on your character's level.

Naturally, Uncut Skill Gems are quite the commodity in Path of Exile 2, as they allow you to take advantage of new and powerful combat skills. Unfortunately, these commodities aren't too common to find across any of the game's locations.

How Uncut Skill Gems work in Path of Exile 2

First and foremost, you need to understand how Uncut Skill Gems work in Path of Exile 2. When you find one of these gems, it will have a number on it.
title: Path Of Exile 2: How To Get Uncut Skill Gems

description:
Warhorse Studios has revealed Kingdom Come Deliverance 2's PC specs and console details. These include some specific settings for PS5 Pro, as well as what differences to expect between Xbox Series X and Series S.

For PC, Warhorse Studio has provided six different PC settings, ranging from low to ultra, as well as three different settings for Xbox Series X|S and PS5. The PC requirements are fairly modest, but the highest settings will demand fairly new and high-end GPUs. The Series S is limited to 30fps, but the Series X has 30fps and 60fps options. The PS5 Pro doesn't seem to offer any different options, rather just combining the target resolution and frame rate of the two options on the base PS5.

Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 PC Specs

  • Average performance: 1080 @ 30fps
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5
title: Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 PC Specs And Console Details Revealed, Including PS5 Pro Settings

description:
One of the earlier quests in Act 1 of Path of Exile 2 is called "The Mysterious Shade," and it requires you to open a Memorial Gate in the Cemetery of the Eternals. Here, you're searching for the Count's Grave and attempting to help a man named Lachlann find peace. When you first enter the cemetery, the Memorial Gate will be locked, and you will need two keys to open it.

Naturally, you have to find those two keys if you want to progress in the quest. To see where those keys are located and how to open the gate, keep reading the guide below.

Opening the Memorial Gate in Path of Exile 2

For starters, the Memorial Gate is located just south of the Waypoint when you enter the Cemetery of the Eternals. It's not highlighted or anything, but it's a large gate that leads to a pathway.
title: Path Of Exile 2: How To Open The Memorial Gate In The Cemetery

description:
The new Citadelle des Morts Zombies map is live in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 with Season 1 Reloaded. This is a new castle map with a full main storyline quest and four elemental wonder weapons you can use. Each sword has its own hidden steps to unlock, and here we guide you through the steps for all four variants.

Additionally, Season 1 Reloaded adds the holiday-themed Merry Mayhem event. The event tiers also reward you with Zombies items, including the new Light Bend ammo mod
title: BO6 Zombies: How To Get Elemental Sword Wonder Weapons For Citadelle Des Morts

description:
If you've decided to pick up Path of Exile 2 on PC, you'll have several customization options when viewing the menu for the first time. From the settings panel, you can change your graphics settings, input device, and the settings for your chosen input device, among other universal options. While Path of Exile 2 doesn't have too many settings in any menu, you still want to go over each menu to fully customize your experience. You can see our recommendations for the best PC settings in Path of Exile 2 in the guide below.

Best PC graphics settings in Path of Exile 2

When it comes to changing your graphics settings, you ultimately need to think about what kind of hardware you're running in your PC. This will determine what you set certain values at in order to maximize the performance you see in-game.
title: Path Of Exile 2: Best PC Settings To Use

description:
At the start of Path of Exile 2, you'll be given a Lesser Life Flask and a Lesser Mana Flask. While these are perfectly fine for the starting areas and enemies, things start to ramp up in difficulty fairly quickly. To ensure you're keeping pace with the difficulty curve in Path of Exile 2, you need to find better Life and Mana Flasks.

Fortunately, the game makes it easy to upgrade both of these items, allowing you to heal more and restore mana faster.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • Upgrading healing and mana flasks in Path of Exile 2

Upgrading healing and mana flasks in Path of Exile 2

There are a few different ways to equip stronger flasks in Path of Exile 2. B
title: Path Of Exile 2: How To Upgrade Healing And Mana Flasks

description: Most of us will never own one of the coolest cars of all time--the 1961 Chevrolet Corvette C1--but this Lego replica of the iconic vehicle is a nice consolation prize. Best Buy has brought back its Black Friday deal on the 1,210-piece Corvette Lego set, dropping the price from $150 down to $105.
title: Lego Corvette Model Kit Is Back On Sale For Its Black Friday Price

description:
Marvel Rivals, NetEase Games' free-to-play hero shooter features a roster of comic book favorites from Marvel. Designed to play very similar to Overwatch, the 6v6 third-person shooter features tons of Marvel characters, like Iron Man, Spider-Man, and Wolverine, on its 33-character launch roster. The launch roster also includes a few characters that haven't been as prominently featured in things like other video games or the MCU, like Jeff the Land Shark and Squirrel Girl. Collectively, the game offers a wide variety of Marvel royalty.

Season 0 is a shortened season to kick off the launch of Marvel Rivals, running for just a little over a month. To match this shorter
title: Marvel Rivals Battle Pass Season 0 - All Skins, Emotes, And Other Rewards

description:
The Vatican City, whether in real life or in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, hides many riches. These include valuable items that have been lost through time. Now, it's up to you to find them all. Here's our guide on where to find all Lost Artifacts of Europe in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle.

All Lost Artifacts of Europe in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle

The Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Lost Artifacts of Europe is a collectible side quest in Vatican City. There are a total of five that you can acquire in this particular zone. Our guide discusses all their locations in detail.


Lost Artifacts of Europe map
title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle - Lost Artifacts Of Europe Guide

description:
In Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, you need to thoroughly explore the Seat of Christendom if you wish to discover all of its secrets. These include curious-looking objects scattered all over crypts and lost shrines. Here's our guide on where to find all Vatican Relics in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle.

All Vatican Relics in Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - Riddles of the Ancients guide

The Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Riddles of the Ancients activity is a collectible-type side quest. The goal is to acquire all 10 Vatican Relics in the Holy City.

This is likely to take you many hours, so we've got a fairly detailed guide to help you every step of the way. Before we discuss the loca
title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle - Vatican Relics And Riddles Of The Ancients Guide

description:
Experiencing escape rooms is the closest thing many fans will have to being in a real video-game world. Three years ago, Pine Studio's Escape Simulator brought that experience home. Now, Pine Studio is doing it again with Escape Simulator 2. The accompanying announcement trailer includes a glimpse at three of the upcoming escape rooms, none of which are confined to a single environment.

Escape Simulator 2 will allow 1-8 players to step into intricately designed escape rooms that were created with help from real-life escape-room builders. The three rooms seen in the trailer are set in a pirate ship linked to a cursed treasure, an enigmatically empty starshi
title: Escape Simulator 2 Will Take Players Into A Derelict Starship, Dracula's Castle, And More

description:
Zenless Zone Zero players have a new update to look forward to. According to a new post on the official PlayStation Blog, Zenless Zone Zero players will gain access to the 1.4 update on December 18.

The update includes a number of new features for the game, including tweaks to overall gameplay, enhancements for PS5 Pro users, and perhaps most exciting of all, two new playable characters.
title: Zenless Zone Zero 1.4 Update Coming Later This Month, Introduces Two New Playable Characters

description:
Best Buy's new round of December Doorbuster deals includes the elusive and very cool Lego Ideas: Home Alone model kit. The 3,955-piece Home Alone house Lego set is on sale for $240, which saves you $60 off its $300 list price. Deals on the Home Alone Lego set are exceedingly rare.

Best Buy offered the same deal during its Black Friday sale and sold out fast. In fact, this Doorbuster deal already sold out once last night, but Best Buy has it in stock again as of 9:30 AM PT on December 6.
title: 3,955-Piece Home Alone Lego Set Gets Huge Discount At Best Buy, Will Sell Out (Again)

description:
It's beautiful, and no, Digital Foundry isn't talking about the Lost Ark. The tech-analysis outfit examined Indiana Jones and the Great Circle on console--comparing Series X and Series S versions--coming away impressed with what developer MachineGames has done on the platforms.

Digital Foundry's tech review by John Linneman states that Indiana Jones and the Great Circle maintains 60fps on both consoles (for the most part) while utilizing ray tracing. Linneman explains that it's rare for a console title to offer open-ended levels, ray tracing, and 60fps together and still perform well.
title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle Wows On Consoles With Ray Tracing And 60FPS - Report

description:
According to a new report, Ubisoft's family founders are trying to find funding to keep the company in good financial standing while simultaneously attempting to keep control of the firm's future.

Reuters reports that the Guillemot family--which owns the largest stake in Ubisoft--is talking to Tencent and other financial partners to try to find a way to fund a "management-led buyout."

CEO Yves Guillemot and his family members are keen to retain control of Ubisoft amid any such deal, and this has apparently been a sticking point in financing discussions. The report said Tencent is asking for a "greater say on future board decisions" in exchange for putting more money into Ubisoft. The report also said Tencent may not invest any further amount of money into Ubisoft.
title: Ubisoft Co-Founders Want To Maintain Control As Talks With Tencent Continue - Report

description:
The world of The Witcher is full of monsters, madmen, and mages, but when Geralt isn't on the trail of any of those, the man knows how to wind down with a game of Gwent. The two-player card game has the players as generals pitting their armies against each other. There's been a Gwent mobile app and free-to-play version on Steam, but now a physical reproduction of the game is on its way.

Hachette Boardgames UK and new publisher No Loading Games--which is focused on bringing licensed brands to tabletop gaming--are collaborating on the release. The set will come with over 400 cards and a playmat to give players that authentic Witcher 3 experience. There will be variant rulesets from casual play to tournament rules.

"Gwent is the biggest 'game within a game' in media history," said the marketing manager for Hachette Boardgames UK, Rob Trounce (via
title: The Witcher's Gwent Card Game Is Heading To The Real World

description:
With just mere hours left until servers go live, Path of Exile 2 has more than 1 million players who've purchased early-access editions of the game. Developer Grinding Gear Games "never expected" these numbers and is now warning about queue times during this weekend.

On X, the official Path of Exile account stated it wanted "to be upfront with you all" about the current situation for the action-RPG. Path of Exile 2 director Jonathan Rogers lays out things in a video, saying, "There are probably going to be some queues during the launch weekend."
title: Path Of Exile 2 Passes Over 1 Million Early-Access Players, Dev Warns Of Server Struggles

description:
The newest Call of Duty weapons have been revealed online, and we are running out of ways to describe how ridiculous and over-the-top the game's guns have become. As announced previously, Black Ops 6 and Warzone are getting numerous new weapons in Season 1 Reloaded, and these include a gun that turns into a bong and a melee weapon that morphs into a rave with a cat as the DJ. Seriously.

Call of Duty has, for many years, enjoyed and embraced pot-smoking, and the new Dank Days skin bundle that turns you into a pot-smoking lizard continues that trend. The gun even lets you spark up and use your gun as a bong, as smoke clouds emerge. The "Toxic Pawsitivity Mastercraft," meanwhile, transforms the baseball bat melee weapon into a rave, with a little cat acting as the DJ. Check out the videos below to see these in action, and expect these store bundles
title: Call Of Duty's New Guns Let You Rip The Bong And Rave With A DJ Kitty

description:
Fallout 4 arrived nearly a decade ago, and it's anyone's guess when Fallout 5 will be released. Thankfully, the fan developers at Team Folon took it upon themselves to create Fallout London, an unofficial Fallout 4 mod that gives players a glimpse of the post-apocalypse in the United Kingdom. Now, Team Folon plans to go even further with an upcoming DLC release for Fallout London.

An important announcement about the future of Fallout: London and Team FOLON.
Fill out the form here:
title: Fallout London Mod Will Get Its Own DLC
